entry.title: 光穆皇后挽歌三首 其一-徐铉
entry.id: https://chocolatetan.github.io/poem/2018/10/16/2018/10/2018-10-16-光穆皇后挽歌三首 其一-徐铉/
entry.content:
仙驭期难改，坤仪道自光。|閟宫新表德，沙麓旧膺祥。|素帟尧门掩，凝笳毕陌长。|东风惨陵树，无复见亲桑。
It is difficult to change the immortal period. The new form of the palace is located in the old town of Sha Lu. The door is shut up. There are no trees in the East.

entry.title: 北苑侍宴杂咏诗 水-徐铉
entry.id: https://chocolatetan.github.io/poem/2018/10/16/2018/10/2018-10-16-北苑侍宴杂咏诗 水-徐铉/
entry.content:
碧草垂低岸，东风起细波。|横汾从游宴，何谢到天河。
The grass is low and the east wind rises. Xie Fen from the tour feast, how to thank Tianhe.

entry.title: 寒食日作-徐铉
entry.content:
厨冷烟初禁，门闲日更斜。|东风不好事，吹落满庭花。|过社纷纷燕，新晴淡淡霞。|京都盛游观，谁访子云家。
When kitchen cold smoke is initially banned, door idle days are more oblique. The east wind is not good, it blew down the full court flowers. There are many swallows in the past, and the new light is light. Kyoto Sheng tour view, who visited the home of Zi Yun.

entry.title: 柳枝辞十二首 其一○-徐铉
entry.id: https://chocolatetan.github.io/poem/2018/10/16/2018/10/2018-10-16-柳枝辞十二首 其一○-徐铉/
entry.content:
暂别扬州十度春，不知光景属何人。|一帆归客千条柳，肠断东风扬子津。
The ten spring of Yangzhou is unknown. Yi Fan returns thousands of willows to the East and Yangzi River.

entry.title: 柳枝词十首 其一-徐铉
entry.content:
金马词臣赋小诗，梨园弟子唱新词。|君恩还似东风意，先入灵和蜀柳枝。
The poetry of the golden horse, the poet of the pear garden, sang the new words. He is also like Dongfeng. He first enters the spirit and Shu willow.

entry.title: 微雨中赏月桂独酌-陈与义
entry.content:
人间跌宕简斋老，天下风流月桂花。|一壶不觉丛边尽，暮雨霏霏欲湿鸦。
The world is full of simplicity, and the world is romantic. A pot does not feel all around, but the rain is wet.

entry.title: 逍遥咏 其一三-宋太宗
entry.content:
流砂一味细堪观，万象笼罗几百般。|须向铅中相假合，分成鼎内见其端。|烟霞聚散归深谷，水火相逢不用干。|养就大还升世界，月宫乞取桂花看。
Flowing sand tastes fine and looks like hundreds of elephant cages. It is necessary to form a false phase in the lead and divide it into a terminal. The smoke and clouds gather and go to the deep valley. It will also raise the world, and the Moon Palace will look for the sweet scented osmanthus.

entry.title: 逍遥咏 其一四-宋太宗
entry.content:
水精宫殿月华明，白玉为墙火不侵。|八境风高骈羽驾，九重天上绛霞深。|物情晃朗无遮隔，非是凡间比类寻。|汗漫真游谁得到，桂花香洁影森森。
The palace of water is bright, and white jade is not a wall fire. Eight winds, high winds, nine heavy heavens. It is not like human beings to search for things. Who can get the sweat and swim?

entry.title: 雨中观秉仲家月桂-陈与义
entry.content:
月桂花上雨，春归一凭栏。|东西南北客，更得几回看。|红衿映肉色，薄暮无乃寒。|园中如许树，独觉赋诗难。
Laurel flowers on the rain, spring back to the fence. The East and West, the north and the south, have to see a few times. The red flesh reflects the flesh color. In the garden, it is hard to feel alone.
